content: श्लेषः [श्लिष्-घञ्] {@--1@} An embrace. {@--2@} Clinging or adhering to. {@--3@} Union, junction, contact; निरंतरश्लेषघनाः <ls>K.</ls> (where it has the next sense also). {@--4@} Pun, paronomasia, {%double entendre%}, susceptibility of a word or sentence, to yield two or more interpretations (regarded as a figure of speech and very commonly used by poets; for def. see <ls>K. P.</ls> Kārikās <ls n="K. P.">84</ls> and <ls n="K. P.">96</ls>); अश्लेषि न श्लेषकवेर्भवत्याः श्लोकद्वयार्थः सुधिया मया किं <ls>N. 3. 69</ls>; see शब्दश्लेष also. {@--5@} Burning.
